nodes.text: This vessel was used by Regenald Hanniper Snopps III during stay on the planet Spira during the Galactic Civil War. A customized Imperial waveskimmer, it measured fourteen meters, and had large windows that a standard military spec waveskimmer. It required a crew of three to operate effectively, as well as a gunner to handle the two light blaster cannons. Twenty passengers could ride in the vessel, and there was room for a metric ton of cargo.

Snopps took the vessel, along with the ship's captain and a squad of six seatroopers on a journey to visit the wreck, a derelict alien spacecraft of unknown origin that was a popular tourist destination on the planet.
